item.title: X-Games 2011
item.description: I was commissioned by ESPN to create key art for the youth marketing for the 2011 Summer and WInter X-Games. The commission was to create sports based thematic scenes, extra characters, type hits, logo treatments and patterns that could then be used by their various suppliers to create products and advertising.
item.content:encoded: I was commissioned by ESPN to create key art for the youth marketing for the 2011 Summer and WInter X-Games. The commission was to create sports based thematic scenes, extra characters, type hits, logo treatments and patterns that could then be used by their various suppliers to create products and advertising.

item.title: Lavafilm
item.description: Lavafilm is a small and courageous film company based in Oslo, Norway. They deliver almost everything in filmmaking and is inspired by fashion and contemporary art. In the development of their identity, we explored the interaction between the classic and the contemporary. We have experimented with a solution, where the sum of the visual elements are the cornerstone of the identity, as opposed to the standard, where the logo stands out as the most important element.
item.content:encoded: Lavafilm is a small and courageous film company based in Oslo, Norway. They deliver almost everything in filmmaking and is inspired by fashion and contemporary art. In the development of their identity, we explored the interaction between the classic and the contemporary. We have experimented with a solution, where the sum of the visual elements are the cornerstone of the identity, as opposed to the standard, where the logo stands out as the most important element.

item.title: MONTREZ VOS COULEURS | SECT ET SEPT
item.description: Photoshoot - " MONTREZ VOS COULEURS " for SECT ET SEPT with the lovely new face Henna from Brand models shot by Federico Cabrera. SECT ET SEPT series portraits the beginning of an idea and the execution of it, it is a journey in captures. it is as well an open concept that calls for the interaction and collaboration of talented creatives. SECT ET SEPT introduces to the public the process of creating a conceptual fashion house from nothing, and for them to be able to see the evolution of it throughout a series of images. For the execution of this journey, different work groups are set up for every series, changing all the time the order and role that different creatives play in it. All SECT ET SEPT series are produced in the format of workshops, meaning that all that is seen in the shoots, are just fabrics and trash that are put together to emulate a real collection, all done on set during the day of the shoot, there is no real clothes used in these series.
item.content:encoded: Photoshoot - " MONTREZ VOS COULEURS " for SECT ET SEPT with the lovely new face Henna from Brand models shot by Federico Cabrera. SECT ET SEPT series portraits the beginning of an idea and the execution of it, it is a journey in captures. it is as well an open concept that calls for the interaction and collaboration of talented creatives. SECT ET SEPT introduces to the public the process of creating a conceptual fashion house from nothing, and for them to be able to see the evolution of it throughout a series of images. For the execution of this journey, different work groups are set up for every series, changing all the time the order and role that different creatives play in it. All SECT ET SEPT series are produced in the format of workshops, meaning that all that is seen in the shoots, are just fabrics and trash that are put together to emulate a real collection, all done on set during the day of the shoot, there is no real clothes used in these series.

item.title: Hedgehog of Death ( prototype leather sculpture )
item.description: Hedgehog of Death (prototype leather sculpture): It was created in the image of between an art object and a toy. It can be decorate a room as a stylish interior, or It can be a fun toy to pause changing. This themes are Leather and metal. The excessive heavy exterior protects your own weakness by armor wrap. I thought there might be something people can relate to their feeling always. I made this in consideration of "mode". And I aimed to the extreme thing of heavy and hard. But I'll take more different approach in next time.
item.content:encoded: Hedgehog of Death (prototype leather sculpture): It was created in the image of between an art object and a toy. It can be decorate a room as a stylish interior, or It can be a fun toy to pause changing. This themes are Leather and metal. The excessive heavy exterior protects your own weakness by armor wrap. I thought there might be something people can relate to their feeling always. I made this in consideration of "mode". And I aimed to the extreme thing of heavy and hard. But I'll take more different approach in next time.
